Here's the Fortran code:

program main
  implicit none
  integer(8) :: n, i_bit, j, ans, div
  integer(8), allocatable :: A(:)
  character(len=20) :: s_ans, s_second, s_third
  integer :: uppercase, lowercase
  integer :: freq(0:255) = 0
  logical :: valid
  integer :: num_distinct, c_code

  div = 10**9 + 7

  ! Read input for first program
  read(*,*) n
  allocate(A(n))
  read(*,*) (A(j), j=1,n)

  ! Compute ans as per first Java program
  ans = 0
  integer(8) :: count1, pow2, term
  do i_bit = 0, 59
    count1 = 0
    do j = 1, n
      if (btest(A(j), i_bit)) then
        count1 = count1 + 1
      end if
    end do
    pow2 = mod(2**i_bit, div)
    term = mod(count1 * (n - count1) * pow2, div)
    ans = mod(ans + term, div)
  end do

  ! Convert ans to string for second program
  write(s_ans, '(I0)') ans
  s_ans = adjustl(s_ans)

  ! Process second program's logic
  uppercase = 0
  lowercase = 0
  do j = 1, len_trim(s_ans)
    character(1) :: c = s_ans(j:j)
    if (c >= 'A' .and. c <= 'Z') then
      uppercase = uppercase + 1
    else if (c >= 'a' .and. c <= 'z') then
      lowercase = lowercase + 1
    end if
  end do

  s_second = s_ans
  if (uppercase > lowercase) then
    do j = 1, len_trim(s_second)
      character(1) :: c = s_second(j:j)
      if (c >= 'a' .and. c <= 'z') then
        s_second(j:j) = char(ichar(c) - 32)
      end if
    end do
  else
    do j = 1, len_trim(s_second)
      character(1) :: c = s_second(j:j)
      if (c >= 'A' .and. c <= 'Z') then
        s_second(j:j) = char(ichar(c) + 32)
      end if
    end do
  end if

  ! Process third program's logic
  s_third = s_second
  freq = 0
  do j = 1, len_trim(s_third)
    c_code = ichar(s_third(j:j))
    freq(c_code) = freq(c_code) + 1
  end do

  valid = .true.
  num_distinct = 0
  do c_code = 0, 255
    if (freq(c_code) > 0) then
      num_distinct = num_distinct + 1
      if (freq(c_code) /= 2) then
        valid = .false.
      end if
    end if
  end do

  if (num_distinct == 2 .and. valid) then
    print *, 'Yes'
  else
    print *, 'No'
  end if

  deallocate(A)
end program main
